column1: Please update Amasty Base module. Re-upload it and replace all the files.
column2: Please update Amasty Base module. Re-upload it and replace all the files.

column1: Enable improved-sorting-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Sorting. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/improved-sorting-graphql
column2: Enable improved-sorting-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Sorting. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/improved-sorting-graphql

column1: Enable amasty/yotpo module to activate Yotpo and Sorting. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/yotpo
column2: Enable amasty/yotpo module to activate Yotpo and Sorting. Please, run the following command in the SSH: composer require amasty/yotpo

column1: Please kindly note: if products on a search results page match the conditions of  Amasty Elastic Search Relevance Rules, the settings listed below will be ignored and products will get sorted by relevance
column2: Please kindly note: if products on a search results page match the conditions of  Amasty Elastic Search Relevance Rules, the settings listed below will be ignored and products will get sorted by relevance

column1: Could not rebuild index for empty products array
column2: Could not rebuild index for empty products array

column2: We can't rebuild the index for an undefined product.

column1: Method object ' . . ' must be implemented by Amasty\Sorting\Api\MethodInterface
column2: Method object ' . . ' must be implemented by Amasty\Sorting\Api\MethodInterface

column2: Error while clear index amasty sorting method:

column1: Yes for Catalog, No for Search
column2: Yes for Catalog, No for Search

column1: Drag and drop sorting options in the order you want them to appear for the customers.
column2: Drag and drop sorting options in the order you want them to appear for the customers.

column1: Press CTRL+mouse to select multiple values. Bestsellers, Most Viewed & Wishlists use Index. Click here to configure category specific sorting options, select category and open the 'Display Settings'.
column2: Press CTRL+mouse to select multiple values. Bestsellers, Most Viewed & Wishlists use Index. Click here to configure category specific sorting options, select category and open the 'Display Settings'.

column1: If it is not important, select `No` to optimize server resources usage.
column2: If it is not important, select `No` to optimize server resources usage.

column1: Use qty to determine if the product is `Out of Stock`
column2: Use qty to determine if the product is `Out of Stock`

column1: Products with the qty < 1 will be shown last regardless of the stock label.
column2: Products with the qty < 1 will be shown last regardless of the stock label.

column1: Synced with Configuration -> Catalog -> Catalog -> Storefront -> Product Listing Sort by
column2: Synced with Configuration -> Catalog -> Catalog -> Storefront -> Product Listing Sort by

column1: Attribute Code for the Newest Sorting
column2: Attribute Code for the Newest Sorting

column1: Leave empty to use product creation date. If you indicate a custom attribute, make sure `Used in Product Listing` for the attribute is set to `Yes`.
column2: Leave empty to use product creation date. If you indicate a custom attribute, make sure `Used in Product Listing` for the attribute is set to `Yes`.

column1: Rename sorting option to match your own vision.
column2: Rename sorting option to match your own vision.

column1: Use to artificially move some products up in the real best sellers list. Leave empty to show real data.
column2: Use to artificially move some products up in the real best sellers list. Leave empty to show real data.

column1: Products from orders with selected states will not be used in the Bestsellers.
column2: Products from orders with selected states will not be used in the Bestsellers.

column1: Use to artificially move some products up in the real most viewed list. Leave empty to show real data.
column2: Use to artificially move some products up in the real most viewed list. Leave empty to show real data.

column1: Use Percentage for Biggest Saving Sorting
column2: Use Percentage for Biggest Saving Sorting

column1: Use Yotpo Reviews instead of Magento Reviews
column2: Use Yotpo Reviews instead of Magento Reviews

column1: Index Bestsellers. 'Update on Save' - to execute once a day by cron
column2: Index Bestsellers. 'Update on Save' - to execute once a day by cron

column2: Index Product Views. 'Update on Save' - to execute once a day by cron

column1: 86400 by default, if not set. To refresh instantly, clear the Blocks HTML Output cache.
